snippet: The Times's hockey writer Jeff Z. Klein sits down for conversations with Seann William Scott and Liev Schreiber, the stars of the movie "Goon," which depicts life as a hockey enforcer.
abstract: The Times's hockey writer Jeff Z. Klein sits down for conversations with Seann William Scott and Liev Schreiber, the stars of the movie "Goon," which depicts life as a hockey enforcer.

headline.main: Conversations With the Stars of the Movie 'Goon'
